revised_title: Aerosol Pollution: Science, Technology, and Health Impacts
tldr: This article discusses the growing problem of aerosol pollution, focusing on particulate aerosols and their technological and environmental impacts. It covers various aspects of aerosol pollution, including formation mechanisms, electrical properties, and health effects. The author highlights the importance of particle size and presents case studies on indoor aerosol pollution and medical aspects of aerosol pollution.
